Headline: Temporary Westbound #20 Madison Reroute near Madison/Hamlin
ShortDescription: Westbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted near Madison/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Hamlin, Washington, Pulaski, Madison, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Madison/Hamlin.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains Forest Park-bound Blue Line between O'Hare and Cumberland
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Cumberland due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Cumberland due to police activity at Rosemont.

As a result, trains are operating O'Hare-bound between O'Hare and Cumberland at this time.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
